ygData.subject: Re: [Digest Number 83]
ygData.msgSnippet: um actually a ranger and warrior (and sk and paladin for that matter) all taunt as well as each other don t they all level +1 * 5 ? Infact a ranger taunts
ygData.messageBody:
um actually a ranger and warrior (and sk and paladin for that matter)
all taunt as well as each other don't they all level +1 * 5 ?

Infact a ranger taunts better MOBs really hate snare and flame lick (go
figure they are low level druid spells). But when ever a ranger casts
either of them it seems to get special attention.

As for ranger spells being useless.
Why I question your judgement....
1. snare ... better then root but they have root too
2. harmony outdoors only makes them a great puller
3. camo and greater camo
if you haven't got a shaman in the group
4. Feetlike cat

And while there dots are not great all damage helps, nor their DD... but
if a MOB roots a few tanks and then takes off no other primarily melee
class can dish as much damage at a distance (crit bow hits and weak dd
spells).


Dave Gaines wrote:
>
> From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>
> >
> > 1 - Monk
> > 2 - Monk / Ranger / Paladin
> > 3 - Enchanter
> > 4 - Druid / Shaman
> > 5 - Cleric
> > 6 - Wizard / Magician
> >
> Change 2 to Monk / Warrior. In a group as diversified
>
> as this, the spells they have are almost useless, and a warrior
> should be able to taunt the monsters better.
>
> Add a bard, replaces 5. In a group of 5 or 6
> a bard is a far better healer than a cleric, and if needed in
> a pinch, the druid/shaman can do the quick healing.
>
> What is the min level for a group in Mistmoore?
>
>
